data.actual_result: Discord (Sometimes) notices when you're talking, but doesn't transmit any sound
data.short_description: Discord doesn't allow changes to audio quality without a restart.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a call with someone - Open the Windows Sound Control Panel (You can do this by right clicking the volume icon and selecting "Recording Devices") - Go to the Recording tab if you haven't already done so, select your microphone, and click "Properties" - Go to the "Advanced" tab - Change the "Default Format" to something other than the current setting, and click "Apply" (I changed it from CD to DVD)
